@SLTchat absolutly. #SLTchat
RT @SLTchat: @MsFindlater so trust is key? #SLTchat
@SLTchat Celebrate their successes.  It is a hard job and we all need a pat on the back from time to time. #SLTchat
@SLTchat Send them on supportive and challenging training.  I loved @TeachingLeaders when I was a middle leader. #SLTchat
